title: Tie Me Down
description: What happens after the Happily Ever After?Once upon a time, a tour manager and a rock star fell in love on a tour bus. Many months and miles later, Kate and Danny are trying to build a life together in between two jet-setting jobs in the music industry. But despite their BDSM lifestyle, Kate is rope-shy once the bedroom door opens.Secretly, she craves more than professional satisfaction, even though she swore sheâ€™d never swap her backstage pass for a picket fence. But it's going to take more than words for this Dom to help his self-reliant submissive realize she's never been more free than when she's tied down.
author: Michelle Hazen
